name: Binex Solutions
description:
Binex Solutions (Pvt) Limited is a software development company, with a specialized focus on:
1. 2D/3D Mobile Games
2. 2D/3D Computer Games
3. Mobile Apps
Binex was founded in 2009 and has been providing quality software development services to its clients worldwide.
"Binex" comes from Binary Excellence and that's something in which we strongly believe in. We have a team of great software developers and engineers who love their work and producing quality software is their primary trait.
